Detailed Description

CAL Pixel Processing configuration control.

struct vpsissCalPixProc

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissCalPixProc::addr

Address of word describing DPCM init context. Should be 16 bytes aligned

uint32_t vpsissCalPixProc::contextToBeUsed

RESERVED - Internal to driver. Value specified here is ignored. Context of pixel processing to be used.

vpsissCalPixDpcmDecoder_t vpsissCalPixProc::decCodec

Decoder required

uint32_t vpsissCalPixProc::enableDpcmInitContext

TRUE configure DPCM Decode to loaded from a specific memory location

vpsissCalPixDpcmEncoder_t vpsissCalPixProc::encCodec

Encoder required

vpsissCalPixExtract_t vpsissCalPixProc::extract

Configure bit extraction

uint32_t vpsissCalPixProc::offSet

Address offset for UV data, when data type if YUV420

vpsissCalPixPack_t vpsissCalPixProc::pack

Packing required
